attribs.name: reactions
attribs.current: +4 to AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the erinyes must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

attribs.name: npc_traits
attribs.current: > Magic Resistance - Advantage on magical saves including spells.

attribs.name: repeating_actions_2_effect
attribs.current: Each creature within 15 ft is frightened for 1 minute or until they make their save at the end of their turn.

attribs.name: npc_resistances
attribs.current: Cold; Bludgeoning, Piercing, And Slashing From Nonmagical Weapons That Aren't Silvered

attribs.name: npc_content
attribs.current:
Traits

**Hellish Weapons**: The erinyes's weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 13 (3d8) poison damage on a hit (included in the attacks).

**Magic Resistance**: The erinyes has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

 Actions

**Multiattack**: The erinyes makes three attacks

**Longsword**: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 13 (3d8) poison damage.

**Longbow**: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. The poison lasts until it is removed by the lesser restoration spell or similar magic.

**Variant: Rope of Entanglement**: Some erinyes carry a rope of entanglement (detailed in the Dungeon Master's Guide). When such an erinyes uses its Multiattack, the erinyes can use the rope in place of two of the attacks.

attribs.name: npcd_resistances
attribs.current: Cold; Bludgeoning, Piercing, And Slashing From Nonmagical Weapons That Aren't Silvered

attribs.name: legendary_actions_display
attribs.current: The Thraxxia can take 0 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Thraxxia regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
